summary: contains full imperial heavy/light, stormcloak armor, mage set + weapons, gold, soulgem and ammo
descriptionHtml:
Hi every1,
<br />
<br />This isn't a cheat mod.
<br />
<br />This mod add a few more items at the chest in Helgen keep.
<br />The chest have now:
<br />- a full light imperial armor + imperial light shield
<br />- a full heavy imperial armor + heavy imperial shield
<br />- imperial bow + imperial sword + 250 iron arrow's
<br />- a full stormcloak armor (no shield)
<br />- a iron war axe
<br />- a full apprentice mage armor set + (gloves and boots)
<br />- fireball staff + 10 soulgem's
<br />- 500 gold
<br />- 10 lockpicks
<br />
<br />As you see this mod has nothing special,
<br />but let you play with a full set that fitting your gamestyle
<br />
<br />I hope you like this mod
author: Lapislover
